title: MiliMil
author: MiliMil
content: Ron DeSantis cannot beat Trump for the Republican Nomination. I repeat DeSantis has no chance at beating Trump.The latest Rasmussen Poll has Trump winning by double digits and I think he'll win by more.Trump only needs around 30% of the vote to win given the amount of potential candidates in the field and I truly believe he'll get that just from the MAGA voters turning out. DeSantis doesn't even have a base outside of Florida.I really believe DeSantis re-election victory has given him a false sense of hope.If you guys want to win some easy money I suggest placing a bet on Trump.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: If you look closely at DeSantis, you will find two things:1. He is reasonably good at working for the people;2. He does it in ways that he isn't really authorized to do as governor, and he hurts some of the people in doing it this way.Trump does similar, but he is way smarter than DeSantis at doing good for all the people.

comments.author: Gyfts
comments.body: You're probably correct because the GOP base has become accustom to losing. They would prefer to have Trump run again after losing once before to the same person, who I may remind you is in some vegetative state.Trump only needs a plurality in the Republican primary. He can get away with a win even if a majority of primary voters vote against him. It's how he was able to win the primaries in 2016. DeSantis would need the support of everyone else except for Trump voters, which is difficult in a crowded primary field where the vote is going to be split a dozen different ways.So if Trump wins the primary, he will lose again to Joe Biden as nearly every head-to-head poll shows Trump losing to Joe Biden. If DeSantis miraculously wins the primary, he would lose to Biden only because ~5% of GOP voters would rather stay home and let Biden win instead of voting for the man that beat out their guy in the primaries.Don't see any foreseeable way Joe Biden leaves office in 2024 meaning a dementia patient will continue to oversee global order.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: I kind agree with you. DeSantis does not know how the deal with insults from Trump. Actually, I was waiting to see who the governor would react to the accusations from the former president on grooming high-school girls... DeSantis did not even fight back. At this point, I believe DeSantis is just hoping for Trump to get indicted and prosecuted, so he won't have to deal with him.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Quote from: MiliMil on February 25, 2023, 12:14:48 PMIf you guys want to win some easy money I suggest placing a bet on Trump.I agree, Donny is back & he means business. It’s going to be really entertaining watching the presidential campaign start once Trump wins this. I really think Trump is going to get back in for another term.People are going to rightly or wrongly link the cost of living issues, war in Ukraine, COVID etc with Biden which means Trump holds all the aces. People are going to want chance & I think they’ll get it.

comments.author: MiliMil
comments.body: Quote from: DeathAngel on February 26, 2023, 11:55:48 PMQuote from: MiliMil on February 25, 2023, 12:14:48 PMIf you guys want to win some easy money I suggest placing a bet on Trump.I agree, Donny is back & he means business. It’s going to be really entertaining watching the presidential campaign start once Trump wins this. I really think Trump is going to get back in for another term.People are going to rightly or wrongly link the cost of living issues, war in Ukraine, COVID etc with Biden which means Trump holds all the aces. People are going to want chance & I think they’ll get it.Are you American? I think without COVID Trump easily defeats Biden. DeSantis is avoiding media appearances and has now pulled out of CPAC because he is afraid of Trump. He thinks running from Trump is going to help him and polls show that is not the case.I think it will be a Trump vs Biden/Newsome presidential race.

comments.author: Zlantann
comments.body: Quote from: MiliMil on February 25, 2023, 12:14:48 PMRon DeSantis cannot beat Trump for the Republican Nomination. I repeat DeSantis has no chance at beating Trump.The latest Rasmussen Poll has Trump winning by double digits and I think he'll win by more.Trump only needs around 30% of the vote to win given the amount of potential candidates in the field and I truly believe he'll get that just from the MAGA voters turning out. DeSantis doesn't even have a base outside of Florida.I really believe DeSantis re-election victory has given him a false sense of hope.If you guys want to win some easy money I suggest placing a bet on Trump.Most of these polls might not reflect the results of the elections. After all Hillary Clinton was projected to win the elections by almost all the polls but she ended up losing. International polls predicted that the Labour Party will win the just concluded Nigerian elections but it turned out negative. Elections are prone to manipulation and situations can immediately change the choice of electorate. Let Ron DeSantis and Donald Trump go to the election and compete for the Republican party ticket and let the winner emerge. I have so much respect for Ron DeSantis because of his courage to contest against the Emperor Emeritus even in the face of political bullying and intimidation.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: If Trump hasn't been preparing all this while after 2020, with online protection from Chinese and others who want to steal his vote mostly electronically, but also with big pushes for accurate mail-in vote counts, and with forced Republican observation of the voting being done, Biden or another Dem will get in. It will be Trump's fault for not fighting fire with fire.DeSantis doesn't stand the chance of a nitrocellulose dog chasing an asbestos cat in hell, except if the vote-controllers want him to win.Who are the vote controllers? The super-super-wealthy elite, who pull electronic strings, and other strings.

comments.author: MiliMil
comments.body: Quote from: BADecker on March 02, 2023, 04:55:26 PMIf Trump hasn't been preparing all this while after 2020, with online protection from Chinese and others who want to steal his vote mostly electronically, but also with big pushes for accurate mail-in vote counts, and with forced Republican observation of the voting being done, Biden or another Dem will get in. It will be Trump's fault for not fighting fire with fire.DeSantis doesn't stand the chance of a nitrocellulose dog chasing an asbestos cat in hell, except if the vote-controllers want him to win.Who are the vote controllers? The super-super-wealthy elite, who pull electronic strings, and other strings.Trump's odds keep getting shorter and shorter. He is now the $1.80 favourite to win the GOP Nomination.The fact that people thought DeSantis had a chance are clueless.https://thehill.com/homenews/campaign/3883230-trump-easily-wins-cpac-straw-poll/

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Quote from: MiliMil on March 05, 2023, 07:36:30 PMQuote from: BADecker on March 02, 2023, 04:55:26 PMIf Trump hasn't been preparing all this while after 2020, with online protection from Chinese and others who want to steal his vote mostly electronically, but also with big pushes for accurate mail-in vote counts, and with forced Republican observation of the voting being done, Biden or another Dem will get in. It will be Trump's fault for not fighting fire with fire.DeSantis doesn't stand the chance of a nitrocellulose dog chasing an asbestos cat in hell, except if the vote-controllers want him to win.Who are the vote controllers? The super-super-wealthy elite, who pull electronic strings, and other strings.Trump's odds keep getting shorter and shorter. He is now the $1.80 favourite to win the GOP Nomination.The fact that people thought DeSantis had a chance are clueless.https://thehill.com/homenews/campaign/3883230-trump-easily-wins-cpac-straw-poll/As I said above (you quoted), Trump's success in 2024 depends on how well he is prepared for election fraud. It doesn't have much to do with how many people love him, or CPAC polls.Trump lost in 2020 not because he didn't have the people. Rather, he lost because of election fraud, just like Kari Lake lost in Arizona. If Trump can't control the fraud, both electronically, and mail-ins, and cheating right in the election centers of the various States, he will lose again.The point isn't Trump vs. DeSantis. DeSantis isn't well enough known to be competition for Trump. The point is Trump vs. whoever the Dems are going to run against him.Watch the video at the below site ( https://rumble.com/embed/v28zcgw/?pub=4 ).Trump Promises "Quantum Leap" For A New Americahttps://www.zerohedge.com/political/trump-promises-quantum-leap-new-america"Past generations of Americans pursued big dreams and daring projects that once seemed absolutely impossible. They pushed across an unsettled continent and built new cities in the wild frontier. They transformed American life with the interstate highway system, magnificent it was, and they launched a vast network of satellites into orbit all around the earth. But today, our country has lost its boldness. Under my leadership, we will get it back in a very big way," Trump said in a video address released Friday....
